Title: Authorizes municipalities located in the county of Orange and county of Rockland to charge for the cost of providing additional police protection to paid-admission events
Summary: Authorizes municipalities located in the county of Orange and county of Rockland to charge for the cost of providing additional police protection to paid-admission events.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize municipalities located in the county of Orange and the county of Rockland to charge for the cost of providing additional police protection to paid-admission events
